Row.Text: I am the Empress Dowager of Qing. Pay your respects to me, and confess your intentions. I grow suspicious of stragglers.
Welcome to the imperial court. I trust you understand the proper protocol? Then why do you just stand there...?
Greetings. I am the Empress Dowager of Qing. Yes, I have heard of you. But I don't think you are half as interesting as I. Well, we shall see at any rate.
I have lived an incomparable life. Treat my heir with compassion and my people with dignity.
I, and I fear my dynasty with me, draws its last breath.
Please. You are wasting my time.
I have had enough of these wasteful appointments. Hurry along with it.
I grow displeased over these all too frequent meetings of ours.
I am not interested.
As I said, I am not interested.
Are you quite finished with wasting my time?
Greetings. You are always welcome in my court.
You are permitted to speak.
Be silent. You will speak when I allow it.
Hold your tongue. You are in my court and will be silent until I permit you to speak.
You are bold to enter my court at this hour.
Do you know nothing of protocol? We are at war.
Greetings. It is a pleasure, of course.
It is a pleasure to have you at my court, as always.
I will not listen to you beg for mercy. Now, if there is nothing else, please leave my court.
If you are here to beg for assistance, then leave now.
A modern nation is not intimidated by mere shows of strength. We will not shirk in the face of your armies marching upon us.
I grow weary over the armies marching upon my lands. What is it that you're planning?
You are mistaken to believe that I will not defend my right to these lands that you claim as your own.
I grow uncomfortable with the spread of your people.
You are a fool if you can believe that gold will uphold your claims to the land.
Do you seek to raise tensions between us? If not, then I ask that you cease your land-grabbing at once.
Your military advantage is clear. It would be wise for me to take heed of it.
Your great wealth is truly the model for a modern state.
Have you considered pledging yourself to another? It's a dangerous world for city-states such as yourself...
Whenever my courtiers complain about our armies, I turn to remind them of yours. That shuts them up.
There is no room for wicked tyrants. Your kind will soon be gone.
We alone cannot withstand the march of progress. Will you join me in a public Declaration of Friendship?
To build my people up as a nation-state, I must have friends willing to help me. Will you agree to a Declaration of Friendship with me?
It cannot be done.
This would be of no service to me.
I ask that you denounce {1_CivName} for their crimes.
{1_CivName} cannot be reasoned with through words alone, and we cannot hope to overcome their evil without your help. What do you say? (WILL DECLARE WAR IMMEDIATELY)
I will not tolerate your meddling in my affairs.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
You have interfered in my court for too long.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
You have declared yourself an enemy of the Qing people.
Then we have no more to discuss.
I notice that you've become friends with {1_CivName}. This brings me some comfort.
I recommend that you not get too close with {1_CivName}. If so... we might have problems getting along.
I'll have you know that {1_CivName} and I have worked together in the past, and I have the utmost respect for them. Just so you're aware.
Glad to hear there are others in the world that share my disgust with {1_CivName}. They are clearly not to be trusted.
I see that you are now friends with {1_CivName}. Good.
I share your disdain for {1_CivName}. Perhaps one day we will have them for dinner.
Your relationship with {1_CivName} troubles me.
Enjoy your time with {1_CivName}. Knowing them, they will backstab you before too long.
Have you come to threaten me? For I see no other reason for you to bring your armies here.
Your armies march towards my lands. I hope they are merely passing through...
These lands belong to my people. I will not see them taken by you.
I request that you settle elsewhere.
Have you no respect for my lands? They are not for sale. Cease your purchases at once.
I ask that you cease spending gold on land that belongs to my people.
My disdain for {1_PlayerName:textkey} has become too much to bear. This is a situation that can only be resolved on the battlefield. Will you join me, friend?
{1_PlayerName:textkey} has become a blight on my people. One that can only be dealt with through war. I seek allies - can I count you among them?
{1_PlayerName:textkey} is a threat to the stability of this world. The time has come to deal with them once and for all. Will you assist me in this effort?

It's come to my attention that you're getting a little friendly with {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. In case you weren't aware, they're within my sphere of influence, and I'd prefer if you stayed out of it.
Out of my sight.
Very well, if that's what it takes.
And allow you to claim it instead? I think not.
I couldn't help but notice how pathetic you are. And when I realized it I couldn't help but share.
Ah, it's always nice to see my favorite city-state again.
I'm really getting tired of seeing your face. My hope is that one day you'll just go away or something.
Ah, it's you. My apologies. Sometimes I get you mixed up with the barbarians I have to swat from time to time.
I thought you might like to know that your army is a little on the weak side. Better watch your back.
With an army so weak it's a surprise your empire hasn't succumb to a barbarian invasion.
Our words are backed with nuclear weapons!
It's a shame there are some leaders in this world who have their fun by picking on the weak. Don't you agree?
I can hear your people wailing in sorrow all the way over in my empire. If you don't do something soon they might just pack up and find a real civilization to live in.
With people so unhappy it's a shock to me that they'd keep you around as their leader.
It's come to my attention that your empire appears to be quite puny. Did you forget to expand your borders or are you just having a little trouble with that?
Travelers have told us that your empire's economy is in pretty sad shape. If you beg a little I might give you a hand. Okay, actually I won't.
What a sad sight... your empire is so uncultured. What do your citizens do all day, beat rocks together?
Rumor has it that your culture is so laughable that even the barbarians are shying away from your lands.
I will not be refused what my people need.
A modern nation is not inhibited by draconian borders. We must come to an agreement to make our two states open to each other.
With all my breath, I will prevent my people from succumbing to our enemies.
If I must perish, why would I not fight you to the death?
Today, at last, the opportunity for revenge has come.
Now that you have started this aggression, I will defend my nation to the last breath.
You have interfered in my empire for too long. It is time to rid the earth of you.
It must be done.
There is only place on this earth for one of us.
This should come as no surprise to you. You have imposed on these lands for too long.
The land which upon you wrongfully sit shall be return to the empire.
Then I will take what my people need.
I will not have your false peace.
There can be no peace with those that continue to pose a threat to my empire.
The war is not over. It is too soon to declare peace.
I will yet turn this war to my advantage. It is too soon to call peace.
Our people are now abolishing the practice of foot-binding! We're worried the rest of the world will also succumb to the influence of your culture.
We are glad to see that your people are now abolishing the practice of foot-binding. The amazing works of our civilization are truly inspiring!
